name: Geometry Slain
description:
Geometry Slain is a linear action game in which you must go through a maze to find keys or potions that allow you to escape from it, you will have to fight with some enemies in order to escape. the goal is to find a way out

Controls:

 Move: O, K, L, Ñ,

Attack: Space

Use Potion: Z

Use Keys:X
